The flag is red, white and blue.  That means we tolerate each other, conservative states, liberal states, and those in between. I do remember the three years of fires in a particular blue state, from 2018, 2019 and 2020.I also remember the red president telling me to "rake my forests" and delayed sending FEMA relief . .  to let his message sink in.  And it did, as the red states hate my state now more  than ever.  You don't know me, you never will, you don't know what I stand for, where  I go to church or how I was educated. But you hate me.  Because I live in a "blue state" as if that somehow makes me less American than you, or that you are somehow  better than me.   You aren't.  My horses that died in flames didn't know I was blue and you red, my small farm, that grew crops to feed  ALL Americans, were not politically weaponized.  So when my blue friend said "I hope Floridians all drown, and any survivors of the hurricane consumed by alligators", well ,I could only say one thing:  they are Americans.

context: There are many who will say that a hurricane or tornado is preferable to the earthquakes of the West coast because you have time to prepare, but from what I've seen on the footage after tornados and hurricanes hit it doesn't look to me like anyone was particularly equipped to handle anything.
